additional driversinstalling through Cloudera ManagerCloudera Managerinstalling additional driversYou can install additional drivers for stages.
Before you use the JMS Consumer and JDBC Consumer origins or the JDBC Producer destination, you need to install drivers for the implementation that you want to use. For example, to use the JDBC Consumer or JDBC Producer with Oracle, install the Oracle JDBC drivers.
Additional drivers for other stages are optional. For example, you can install custom classes for the JavaScript or Jython Evaluators.
To install additional drivers for a administered by Cloudera Manager, perform the following steps:reverse these steps, then smooth out?
On every node that runs the , copy the drivers to the STREAMSETS_LIBRARIES_EXTRA_DIR defined for the StreamSets service. By default, the path is/var/lib/sdc. Use a directory structure for each set of drivers based on the stage library name and directory structure as follows:
$STREAMSETS_LIBRARIES_EXTRA_DIR/<stage library directory>/lib
For example to install drivers for JMS in an opt/sdc-extras directory, you would copy them to the following directory: $STREAMSETS_LIBRARIES_EXTRA_DIR/streamsets-datacollector-jms-lib/lib/
In Cloudera Manager, select the StreamSets service and then click Configuration.
On the Configuration page, in the Data Collector Advanced Configuration Snippet (Safety Valve) for sdc-env.sh field, add the STREAMSETS_LIBRARIES_EXTRA_DIR environment variable and point it to the driver directory, as follows:export STREAMSETS_LIBRARIES_EXTRA_DIR = <driver directory>
For example: export STREAMSETS_LIBRARIES_EXTRA_DIR = /opt/sdc-extras/
When using the Java Security Manager, which is enabled by default, update the Data Collector Advanced Configuration Snippet (Safety Valve) for sdc-security.policy property to include the driver directory as follows:
// user-defined additional driver directory grant codebase "file://<driver directory>-" { permission java.security.AllPermission; };
For example: // user-defined additional driver directory grant codebase "file:///opt/sdc-extras/-" { permission java.security.AllPermission; };
